subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में किस मंगलवाल पसंदीदा है?
explanation_en:
Sajjangarh Fort, also known as Paldeo Fort, is a famous fort located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan. It was built by Rao Maharaja Sajjan Singh Rathore in the 16th century.
